long_description: Enjoy a nutritious and delicious KIND Plus bar the next time you need a midafternoon snack. KIND Plus bars are made with all-natural ingredients. Cranberry Almond flavor is high in vitamins A, C and E. Almond Cashew flavor is enhanced with flaxseed to provide Omega-3 fatty acids. Mango Macadamia flavor is enhanced with calcium and provides 50% of the recommended daily value of folic acid and vitamin D. Almond Walnut Macadamia flavor is loaded with protein. All flavors may contain nuts, seeds or nut/seed residue as well as trace amounts of dairy. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Enjoy a nutritious and delicious KIND Plus bar the next time you need a midafternoon snack.
